summary: An ordinance providing for the construction of a trunk sewer in Bradford Street, from a point 120 feet east of 44th Avenue South to 43rd Avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7762 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds"; adopting the maps, plane and specifications for such improvement.
